summary: Completed comprehensive testing of FBASense Smart Inventory App in demo mode. All 8 required screens tested successfully with proper demo mode functionality.
passed_tests: Auth page loads with demo mode banner
Login/signup functionality works in demo mode
Dashboard displays correct KPIs (8 SKUs, 941 total stock, 3 low stock items)
All 8 navigation pages accessible (Dashboard, Inventory, Low Stock, Sales, Profit, Upload, Export, Settings)
Demo mode banner visible throughout the app
Inventory table with search and sorting functionality
Low stock alerts showing 3 items below threshold
Sales summary with date range filtering
Profit analysis with cost vs revenue calculations
Upload page shows demo mode warning and disabled state
Export center shows disabled buttons in demo mode
Settings page with proper demo mode restrictions
Mobile responsive design with working hamburger menu
All backend APIs return correct mock data
Demo mode restrictions properly implemented (403 errors for write operations)
